thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 4 of 62
thread.title: Scott Roh

author: Scott Roh
title: Scott Roh
text: For some time now I had a formatting/layout change I wanted to have done on my Wordpress site. I'm the kind of person that dabbles enough with coding I tried to figure it out myself I should not have wasted my time. I contacted TemplateMonster, where I purchased my WordPress template from, and within 30 seconds Alison knew exactly how to change the coding. Now my site and CSS present my site JUST the way I want and have wanted. Thank you TM and Alison. Coffee on me... who do I send it to! SAR
